paragraphs: I'm a full-stack web developer specializing in building modern, scalable, and user-focused applications. I work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, and use frameworks like Laravel, React, Next.js, and Inertia.js to create fast, maintainable, and production-ready systems.

On the backend, I design structured APIs and data-driven applications using Laravel, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Supabase. On the frontend, I craft clean and responsive interfaces with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and modern React-based workflows.

I also develop mobile applications using React Native and Ionic, and handle deployments using tools like DigitalOcean, Vercel, PM2, and Git, ensuring reliable hosting, version control, and smooth production releases.
Overall, I focus on turning ideas into functional products—balancing performance, clean code, and real-world usability.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I build responsive, performant websites using modern tools and best practices, focusing on clean code, scalability, and real-world usability.

services.title: Frontend Engineering
services.description: I create intuitive user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, paying close attention to layout, accessibility, and smooth user experience.

services.title: Backend & APIs
services.description: I develop reliable backend systems using PHP and Laravel, designing RESTful APIs, handling data securely, and structuring applications for long-term growth.

services.title: Product-Focused Projects
services.description: I turn ideas into functional products—prototypes, internal tools, or community-driven apps—always prioritizing clarity, impact, and maintainability.
